oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Old McEwen White School (abandoned)

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schools; Public schools; Educational facilities; Playgrounds
Education - Tennessee; Education - History - Tennessee; School buildings - Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front and side views of the Old McEwen White School. It is a large two-story brick building with a playground at one side. There is a basketball goal in the background.
This school was replaced by the McEwen Consolidated School in 1927. The building was later abandoned.
